Package org.opensextant.giscore.utils

Class SimpleFieldCacher

java.lang.Object
org.opensextant.giscore.utils.SimpleFieldCacher
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObjectCacher
public class SimpleFieldCacher extends Object implements IObjectCacher
This cacher recognizes and caches simple fields to reduce the overhead in the object buffer.
Author:
DRAND

      public Long getObjectOutputReference(Object field)
      Description copied from interface: IObjectCacher

    • shouldCache

      public boolean shouldCache(Object field)
      Description copied from interface: IObjectCacher
      Take an output object and check to see if the object should be reduced to a reference.
      Specified by:
      shouldCache in interface IObjectCacher
      Parameters:
      field - the object to consider, never null
      Returns:
      true indicates that this object should be cached and reduced to a reference for future output.
